data.text: @tripperhead 'Emergency message that should have been an SMS' is the new 'meeting that should have been an email'
@tripperhead As a teenager I remember going there after I had a fall in PE class, my wrist was fractured, so the x-ray and cast took 6 hours, lots of waiting , very slow, but total bill hk$7...
@tripperhead Is that an upgrade for QEH?
